Detailed Description

template<class TYPE>
class SAMRAI::math::PatchSideDataOpsReal< TYPE >

Class PatchSideDataOpsReal provides a collection of operations to manipulate float and double numerical side-centered patch data. The operations include basic arithmetic, norms and ordering, and assorted miscellaneous operations. With the assertion of a few basic routines, this class inherits its interface (and thus its functionality) from the base classes PatchSideDataBasicOps, PatchSideDataNormOpsReal, and PatchSideDataMiscellaneousOpsReal from which it is derived. The name of each of these base classes is indicative of the set of side-centered patch data operations that it provides.

Note that this templated class should only be used to instantiate objects with double or float as the template parameter. A similar set of operations is implemented for complex and integer patch data in the classes PatchSideDataOpsComplex and PatchSideDataOpsInteger, repsectively.

See also:
math::PatchSideDataBasicOps

math::PatchSideDataMiscellaneousOpsReal

math::PatchSideDataNormOpsReal

template<class TYPE>
void SAMRAI::math::PatchSideDataOpsReal< TYPE >::copyData ( const boost::shared_ptr< pdat::SideData< TYPE > > &  dst,
const boost::shared_ptr< pdat::SideData< TYPE > > &  src,
const hier::Box &  box 
) const

Copy dst data to src data over given box.

Precondition:
dst && src

dst->getDirectionVector() == src->getDirectionVector()

(dst->getDim() == src->getDim()) && (dst->getDim() == box.getDim())

template<class TYPE>
void SAMRAI::math::PatchSideDataOpsReal< TYPE >::swapData ( const boost::shared_ptr< hier::Patch > &  patch,
const int  data1_id,
const int  data2_id 
) const

Swap pointers for patch data objects. Objects are checked for consistency of depth, box, and ghost box.

Precondition:
patch

patch->getPatchData(data1_id) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::SideData<TYPE> >

patch->getPatchData(data2_id) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::SideData<TYPE> >

patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getDepth() == patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getDepth()

patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getBox().isSpatiallyEqual(patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getBox())

patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getDirectionVector() == patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getDirectionVector()

patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getGhostBox().isSpatiallyEqual(patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getGhostBox())
